ITALIAN

Classic Italian Meat Sauce

Ground Sirloin simmered in our garden tomato red sauce

House Marinated Chicken Breast

Marinated Amish chicken breast, cast iron seared and slow roasted.

Grilled Fish in Lemon Caper

Grilled Organic USA Tilapia in Lemon Caper sauce

Italian Sausage, Peppers & Onions

Slow roasted Italian sausage, sweet bell peppers, onions and garden tomato red sauce

Ziti pasta with garden tomato red sauce, ricotta and whole milk mozzarella cheese and Italian Sausage

Classic

Meat sauce, ricotta and whole milk mozzarella cheese, aged parmesan, with Italian pasta

Three Cheese

Classic lasagna without meat

Links
